bartender.name: bartender
bartender.greeting: Hello Sea Captain, how goes yer adventurin'?
bartender.recruitMessage: Arr, sorry cap'ain. No longer do I belong to the sea. My time has passed, you may try that stranger in the corner. I heard he might be interested in a crew.

stranger.name: stranger
stranger.greeting: Arrr, I don't know ye stranger. Whatcha be wanting?
stranger.recruitMessage: I do be interested in joinin' a crew. If you shall have me then I'm at your service

mourner.name: mourner
mourner.greeting: I would like to be left alone right now, please come back later.
mourner.recruitMessage: I do be interested in joinin' a crew. If you shall have me then I'm at your service

zombie.name: zombie
zombie.greeting:
Sorry if we got off to a rough start.
My name is Gregory, I seem to have dropped my head. Would you mind handing it to me?
zombie.recruitMessage: I do be interested in joinin' a crew. If you shall have me then I'm at your service
zombie.intro: You enter a crypt and see a zombie headed directly towards you!!! You draw your weapon for battle ***
zombie.victory:
***VICTORY***
With your final blow, the zombie's head appears to have rolled onto the floor.
It looks like you can talk to the head O.O
zombie.defeat:
***DEFEATED***
As things fade you black, you think you faintly hear the zombie say, "Well that was rather rude"

dog.name: dog
dog.greeting: Woof Woof! * A three headed dog jumps on you and sticks his tongue out. *
dog.recruitMessage:
* The three heads bark in unison and they start following you around * 
You start to think the dog likes you.

innkeeper.name: innkeeper
innkeeper.greeting: Sorry, we don't have any vacant rooms right now.
innkeeper.recruitMessage: Sorry kid, my sailin' days are behind me. I am flattered you would try to recruit an old man like me.

pirate.name: pirate
pirate.greeting: Hoy! Matey! Hope ya day is as salty as I am.
pirate.recruitMessage: You made a great choice mate. I am the best QuarterMaster in all of the West Coast. Self-proclaimed of course, so don't blame me if somethin' goes wrong.

doctor.name: doctor
doctor.greeting: If it ain't an emergency, or you got scurvy, then I don't have time to chat with you.
doctor.recruitMessage: My place is here in Dark Reef. I don't have the luxury of leaving and participating in your foolish plans.

apprentice.name: apprentice
apprentice.recruitMessage: Great! I've been waiting for the right opportunity to leave this forsaken place. Adventure is what I have been craving. I'm sorry Mom, I will not be a doctor!

receptionist.name: receptionist
receptionist.greeting: The doctor is busy right now. We do not have any open appointments. Please leave. Now.
receptionist.recruitMessage: I can't afford to be stuck at sea for months. Just imagine what it would do to my hair.

cook.name: cook
cook.greeting: If you ain't payin, then I don't need you stickin around
cook.recruitMessage:
My dream is always been to sail the seas and discover all types of marine animals.
You will be pleased to hear that my cooking skills are top notch. 
My specialty? Boiled water. Good ain't it?

greenbeard.name: Captain Greenbeard
greenbeard.intro:
A zombie with a big, green, seaweed filled beard walks up to you holding a Cutlass.

 "Arrggg, think ya can just take me treasure so easily? Think again young Captain" 

The zombie lunges at you with their sword!
You draw your weapon and proceed to battle!!!!
greenbeard.lose: OH NO, i have been defeated. And so i die  X_X
greenbeard.recruitMessage: I do be interested in joinin' a crew. If you shall have me then I'm at your service
greenbeard.greeting: Hello. I seem to have dropped my head. Would you mind handing it to my body for me?
greenbeard.victory:
With a final blow, Captain Greenbeard falls to the sand and looks up at you, 
"I've been bested...
Safe travels young Captain, yer crew is mighty fine.."

Sailing off into the sunset, your crew sings the praises of their great Captain

###VICTORY###
Good Job Gamer :)
greenbeard.defeat:
***DEFEATED***
 A shine from Greenbeard's cutlass is the last thing you see as you fall to the ground. Perhaps you can join his zombie crew?
